item.title: Israel's military chief resigns over 7 October 2023 failures
item.description: Lt Gen Herzi Halevi says "the terrible failure" to prevent the Hamas attack "accompanies me every day".

item.title: Nine Palestinians killed as Israeli forces launch major operation in Jenin
item.description: Israel's prime minister says the "extensive" operation aims to "defeat terrorism" in the West Bank city.

item.title: Dozens killed as fire engulfs Turkish ski hotel
item.description: More than 50 have been injured in the blaze, which broke out at the Grand Kartal Hotel.

item.title: Bishop asks Trump to show mercy to LGBT people and migrants
item.description: Right Rev. Mariann Edgar Budde made a plea to the president in a sermon that Trump later criticised.

item.title: BBC Verify: Can Donald Trump really rename the Gulf of Mexico?
item.description: The new US President wants to rename the Gulf of Mexico to the Gulf of America. How would that work?
